name: Guardian Pillar: Myriad Warriors
description: Tall, sturdy, and highly reliable, these massive stone pillars are densely adorned with stepped patterns. Said to bear the weight of the Stadium of the Sacred Flame, they stand as symbols of Natlan's warriors.\nIn the war against the Abyss, it was the grit and courage of the warriors who were fighting on the frontlines that held things together â€” they were the pillars of peace and its ultimate safeguard. May their sacrifices and dedication never be forgotten...
